name: Alphabet Soup for the Foul [DEMO]
description:
CONTROLS: Move and click with mouse cursor. 

Menu interface is a holdover from the full desktop download; 'Options' can be exited with Escape button, 'Quit' simply cease game functions instead of closing window. Frame stutters and loads may be present due to modifying and condensing assets.

"Alphabet Soup for the Foul" is a narrative point-and-click adventure set inside a fantasy supermarket. Players will help the timid Teo around the cult-run store to collect ingredients for a cosmic soup. Word puzzles, funky aisles, and even more soup-rises are in stock!

This is a small demo of "Alphabet Soup for the Foul", a game developed by See You Tomorrow. I helped with writing and was in charge of audio for this team project. 

Full credits and proper Mac & Windows zip downloads are available at  http://www.studentgamesarchive.ca/
